product.name: VANoopee 3-Color Zoomable Ceiling Spot Lights Indoor Flush Mount Adjustable LED Ceiling Spotlight Directional Light Fixture Dimmable Accent Light for Picture Art -CRI90 15-60Â° 10W 1000lm White
product.description:
With VANoopee directional lighting, you have the freedom to select your desired color temperature from a range of options. We offer 3000k warm white, 4000k neutral white, and 5000k day light to ensure you can create the perfect ambiance for your space
VANoopee ceiling spot light features an innovative zoomable optical module, allowing for an adjustable beam angle from 15Â° to 60Â°. This powerful technology provides a brilliant and uniform light spot that is perfect for highlighting high-end clothing or artwork. When you need to showcase your most valuable pieces, VANoopee ceiling spot light ensures that every detail shines through
10W COB spot light delivering an impressive 1,000 lumens - that's equivalent to a 50W incandescent bulb! So this ceiling spotlight is significantly brighter than other indoor spot lighting options. And it's dimmable with a TRIAC type dimmer(not include), allowing you to smoothly adjust the brightness from 10% to 100%
The spot ceiling light equipped with a mounting bracket that fits seamlessly onto any standard octagonal box. Additionally, the fast connector makes wiring the light a breeze
Specification
Wattage: 10W
Beam Angle:15Â°-60Â°
Input Voltage: 120V
Material: Aluminum+PC
Lumen Output:1000LM
Color Rendering Index:90+
Dimmble with TRIAC dimmerï¼ˆNOT includeï¼‰
CCT: 3 color adjustable(3000K 4000K 5000K)
Installation: Install on 3" or 4" Junction box
